oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1940-02-24 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from February 2, 1940. Hosted by George Hay with announcer David Stone.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Uncle Dave Macon; Ford Rush; Roy Acuff
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: George D. Hay introduces Uncle Dave Macon -- Lonesome Road Blues (Uncle Dave Macon) -- George D. Hay introduces 'Sally Gooden' -- Sally Gooden -- George D. Hay introduces Ford Rush -- Swing The Ladies Up And Down (Ford Rush) -- George D. Hay introduces Roy Acuff -- Beautiful Brown Eyes (Roy Acuff) -- George D. Hay introduces Uncle Dave Macon -- Something's Always Sure To Tickle Me (Uncle Dave Macon) -- George D. Hay introduces 'Old Grey Bonnet' -- Old Grey Bonnet -- George D. Hay introduces David Stone -- Prince Albert tobacco commercial (David Stone) -- George D. Hay introduces Little Liza Jane -- Little Liza Jane -- Closing statement (George D. Hay) -- Closing statement and program advertisements (David Stone)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Stone, David P., 1901-1995; Macon, Uncle Dave, 1870-1952; Acuff, Roy; Rush, Ford, 1895-
